data.name: Gowang: Clash On Demonhead
data.detailed_description:
Gowang: Clash On Demonhead is an indie 1-8 Player 3D Party Fighter, featuring Rollback Netcode, Arcade Mode, Item Fusion, and Chaotic Mini Games.

Gowang: Clash On Demonhead is a 3D party fighting game with a mix combat mechanics and quirky mini games. Fighters all over space have been summoned to defeat the Demon King from ressurecting! Fight your way across various world till you can get to the top of Demon Head skull and put a end to this madness!

The fighting mechanics focus on fast-paced combat, strategic use of your environment, and weapons in the arena. Fight against challenging AI or your friends, online or offline!

Key features include:

- Battle in heated 1v1s to 8 player chaos or team battle!
-Interact with the arena to get the upper hand on your opponent.
- Unique move sets per characters and team attacks to really make devastating attacks.
-Local Multiplayer + Online Multiplayer using Rollback Netcode
-Weapon Pickups ranging from bullets to rocket launching cats! Be sure to collect all the items to fuse and create more at the item shop!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit OS required)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4160
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit OS required)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4690
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660
  • Storage: 60 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: Girls and Guys In Lewd Outfits is DLC
